p: Data were analyzed using Statistical Package for Social Sciences (SPSS, IBM Statistics version 23, Chicago, IL, USA). Food composition results are expressed as the mean value ± standard deviation of three separate determinations, and data were evaluated using two-way ANOVA and Tukey’s post-hoc test. Sensory parameters were analyzed by comparing the means using one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s post-hoc test. In all analysis, significant differences were determined at the p < 0.05 level.
